item.title: Degrading Items [317 pi]
item.dc:creator: @l_skinner_l l skinner l
item.description:
@l_skinner_l wrote:

umm in my pi i have this and it had worked you might have to add a little bit more to other places but this is the main thing to make it degrade or stop degrading.

/* DEGRADING */ if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] >= 0) { c.degradeTime++; } if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 0 && c.degradeTime == 450) {// VLS Degrade. c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 3); // remove the equiped item c.sendMessage("Your vesta's longsword has degraded into nothing."); // send a message c.degradeTime = 0; // put the degrade number back to 0 so it can degrade again @ 500 } if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 0 && c.degradeTime == 500) {// STAT Degrade. c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 3); // remove the equiped item c.sendMessage("Your Statius warhammer has degraded into nothing."); // send a message c.degradeTime = 0; // put the degrade number back to 0 so it can degrade again @ 500 } if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 0 && c.degradeTime == 450) {// Spear Degrade. c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 3); // remove the equiped item c.sendMessage("Your vesta's spear has degraded into nothing."); // send a message c.degradeTime = 0; // put the degrade number back to 0 so it can degrade again @ 500 }

now where i had put the 0 is the item id. like shown here if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 0
